subject: Tennis
Croquet
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
organizations: All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club
lead_paragraph: The All England Club, which now hosts one of tennis’s four Grand Slam tournaments, was born from croquet, but the game of mallets and hoops now has only a fraction of the popularity of tennis.
snippet: The All England Club, which now hosts one of tennis’s four Grand Slam tournaments, was born from croquet, but the game of mallets and hoops now has only a fraction of the popularity of tennis.
